translation.en: [man] Beer.
translation.zh: 啤酒

translation.en: A wise man once said
translation.zh: 一位智者曾说过

translation.en: that beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
translation.zh: 啤酒让你感受到没有啤酒时应有的感觉

translation.en: Couldn't agree more.
translation.zh: 完全同意

translation.en: First one's on the house.
translation.zh: 第一杯请你喝

translation.en: Uh, actually, I'm looking for the Accommodator.
translation.zh: 其实吧 我是想买头戴款

translation.en: Sorry. We don't have the Accommodator.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们没有头戴款啤酒

translation.en: Yeah, it's not a beer. It's a dildo.
translation.zh: 是啊 不是啤酒 是假阳具

translation.en: [stammering] What? Why does everyone think this is a porn shop?
translation.zh: 什么？为什么人人都觉得这里是色情商品店呢？

translation.en: Well, we're in Van Nuys,
translation.zh: 我们在凡奈斯

translation.en: and you spelled "extreme" with triple X's, so...
translation.zh: 你把“极品”写成“XXX” 所以…

translation.en: Okay, because my last name is Rodman, and the beer,
translation.zh: 好吧 因为我姓罗德曼 你要尝到的啤酒 是非常极品的

translation.en: as you will taste, is very extreme.
translation.zh: 你要尝到的啤酒 是非常极品的

translation.en: -This is my most drinkable ale. -Mmm!
translation.zh: 这是最好喝的艾尔啤酒

translation.en: It's called the Rod Guzzler.
translation.zh: 名字叫做大棒酒鬼

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: -This is bright beer. Nothing fresher. -Bright beer.
translation.zh: -这是清啤酒 清爽无比-清啤酒

translation.en: -Okay. -[Rodman] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [customer] Mmm! Incredible.
translation.zh: 太好喝了

translation.en: If you just sold dildos and fetish wear
translation.zh: 如果你卖假阳具和恋物装

translation.en: like you advertise, this place would be a home run, Wilheim.
translation.zh: 就像广告牌写的这里肯定超多顾客的 威脸

translation.en: My name's Wilhelm.
translation.zh: 我叫威廉

translation.en: My real name's Will, but I had it legally changed to Wilhelm,
translation.zh: 我本来叫威尔但我把名字改成了威廉

translation.en: in honor of the Bavarian duke responsible for the Reinheitsgebot,
translation.zh: 为了纪念颁布《啤酒纯酿法》的巴伐利亚公爵

translation.en: which is the beer purity law of 1516.
translation.zh: 就是1516年颁布的《啤酒纯酿法》

translation.en: Ooh, Chuy, Chuy, Ch-Chuy! Come here!
translation.zh: 楚伊！ 过来！

translation.en: Come here. You gotta meet this guy.
translation.zh: 快过来 见见他

translation.en: Chuy used to work at the auto body shop next door,
translation.zh: 楚伊以前在隔壁的汽车修理厂工作

translation.en: and I poached him because he wanted a little career change.
translation.zh: 我把他挖来 因为他想换工作

translation.en: I wanna be a businessman, so I watch him.
translation.zh: 我想成为一个商人 所以我观察他

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Chuy.
translation.zh: 谢谢 楚伊

translation.en: If I just do the opposite of whatever he does,
translation.zh: 无论他做什么 我就反着做

translation.en: sky's the limit for me.
translation.zh: 前途无可限量

translation.en: -[Wilhelm laughs] Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -行吧-好吧

translation.en: Hey, boss, tonight I'm throwing a tasting party
translation.zh: 老板 今晚我想开一个品酒会

translation.en: for my soccer buds.
translation.zh: 邀请跟我踢球的朋友

translation.en: Mind if I take home a little research?
translation.zh: 介意我带点资料回家吗？

translation.en: Take whatever you want. You know that's the rule.
translation.zh: 想拿什么 就拿什么 你知道规矩的

translation.en: Thank you. Later, man.
translation.zh: 谢谢 回见了 伙计

translation.en: What a great guy, right?
translation.zh: 他很棒 是吧？

translation.en: -Incredible. -He's a gem.
translation.zh: -棒极了-他最棒了

translation.en: -[customer] You're lucky to have him. -Nope, drop it.
translation.zh: -你能雇他 真是幸运-不行 放下

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Your car's being towed.
translation.zh: 你的车被拖走了

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: -Mm-kay. Bye. -[customer] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: -好吧 拜拜-可恶

translation.en: -So sorry. See you again. -Bye, Ben. Nice meeting you.
translation.zh: -替你遗憾哟 回头见了-很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Bye! Okay. -Hope you get your dildo.
translation.zh: -祝你买到假阳具-好吧

translation.en: Stop letting Chuy take the booze.
translation.zh: 别再让楚伊把酒拿走了

translation.en: Will, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 威尔 你在做什么？

translation.en: -LeBron James or Abe Lincoln? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 像不像勒布朗詹姆斯或林肯？

translation.en: -Colonel Sanders. -[coughs]
translation.zh: 像肯德基爷爷

translation.en: Oh, my God, Will, get your shit together.
translation.zh: 天啊 威尔 淡定一点

translation.en: [laughing] Everything is gonna be fine, okay?
translation.zh: 一切都会没事的 好吗？

translation.en: The distributor's coming by today. He likes our beer.
translation.zh: 经销商今天会过来他喜欢我们的啤酒

translation.en: -We're golden. Stop being a buzzkill. -Oh, my God. I--
translation.zh: -我们最棒了 宝贝 不要扫兴了-天啊 别闹了

translation.en: I see how much you drink, okay? Nothing can kill your buzz.
translation.zh: 你喝多了 好吗？没人能扫你的酒兴

translation.en: Even your dog is day drunk.
translation.zh: 连你的狗都喝醉了

translation.en: So what? He's a little drunk.
translation.zh: 那又如何？它有点喝醉了

translation.en: -Friar Lucas knows when to say when. -Does he?
translation.zh: 卢卡斯修士知道适可而止 是吗？

translation.en: Come here. I got a question for you.
translation.zh: 过来 我有问题问你

translation.en: -Why did you put the darts on this side? -[Wilhelm] Ah, let me tell you why.
translation.zh: 你为什么把飞镖放在这边？ 让我告诉你为什么吧

translation.en: I needed room for my latest genius promotion.
translation.zh: 我需要地方 留给我的天才促销方式…

translation.en: Ta-da, huh? Pretty good.
translation.zh: 嗒哒！ 很棒吧！

translation.en: You take a growler home with you,
translation.zh: 你买走一坛带回家

translation.en: and then you get another one for free when you come back.
translation.zh: 下次回来时 可以免费再得一坛

translation.en: -It's gonna catch on like wildfire. -[older man grunting]
translation.zh: 肯定能大卖特卖

translation.en: I think it already has.
translation.zh: 我觉得已经是这样了

translation.en: No, hey, that is the wrong kind of growler.
translation.zh: 不要啊 一滩的意思不是这样

translation.en: You can't do that here!
translation.zh: 你不能在这里大便

translation.en: Hey, the sign says I can.
translation.zh: 这块牌子写着呢

translation.en: "Take a growler, leave a growler." Same thing.
translation.zh: “拿走一坛 留下一滩” 一个意思

translation.en: No, not my kind of growlers.
translation.zh: 我不是这意思

translation.en: -Please, get out of here. -[squelches]
translation.zh: 你赶紧走吧

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不是吧！

translation.en: Yes. You see, to my point,
translation.zh: 是啊 你看啊 在我看来

translation.en: I'm taking a growler here, and this morning,
translation.zh: 我在这里来一滩 今天早晨时

translation.en: I left a growler there.
translation.zh: 我在那边留下一滩

translation.en: You see? Same thing.
translation.zh: 看到了吧 一样的

translation.en: -You need shoes. -It's sanitary.
translation.zh: -挺卫生的-听着 你显然需要一双鞋

translation.en: -I... don't need these anymore. -[groans]
translation.zh: 我已经不需要这双鞋了

translation.en: You have to promise me you will stop taking a growler!
translation.zh: 你得跟我保证 以后别在这里大便了

translation.en: But can I leave a growler?
translation.zh: 但我可以在那边留下一滩吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna give you my shoes, and you're gonna go, okay?
translation.zh: 我把我的鞋给你 然后你就走吧 好吗？

translation.en: [older man] But that I could, my dear man.
translation.zh: 那就最好了 哥们

translation.en: Since the death of printed media, I'm at a loss for wipes, hmm?
translation.zh: 自从印刷媒体消亡以来 我就没有擦屁股纸了

translation.en: Ever tried to wipe your ass with a Kindle?
translation.zh: 你试过用电子书擦屁股吗？

translation.en: -[groans] -No!
translation.zh: 没有！

translation.en: -Back to the statehouse, Senator. -Senator? What?
translation.zh: -回州议会去吧 参议员-参议员？ 什么？

translation.en: The rock shoe of the white, urban climber.
translation.zh: 迈乐鞋呀 白人城市攀爬者的攀岩鞋

translation.en: [man] Hmm. The hops are timid, and there's a meek earthiness vying for attention.
translation.zh: 啤酒花味道淡淡的有一股温柔的泥土气息很勾人

translation.en: [smacks lips] Detecting a delicate bouquet of pine with notes of citrus.
translation.zh: 有一股松树的清香 带有柑橘的味道

translation.en: Possibly clementines?
translation.zh: 是不是细皮小柑橘？

translation.en: -[Chuy] He's good. -[smacks lips]
translation.zh: 好厉害

translation.en: If the brewmaster remembered that he was making a beer
translation.zh: 如果酿酒师记得他做的是啤酒

translation.en: and not a smoothie, you might really have something here.
translation.zh: 而不是冰沙 也许就能做出点东西

translation.en: Unfortunately, the beer, much like the brewmaster himself,
translation.zh: 可惜啤酒就像酿酒师自己的味道

translation.en: smells like, as he would say, "Scheiße!" [chuckles]
translation.zh: 闻起来就像“一坨屎”！

translation.en: -You can pour that out. -Hello, Adam.
translation.zh: -你可以倒出来-你好 亚当

translation.en: -Nice to see you, too. -[Adam] Hi.
translation.zh: -也很高兴见到你-嗨

translation.en: Wait. Who's this guy?
translation.zh: 等等 这家伙是谁？

translation.en: -My brother. -Bring it in.
translation.zh: -我哥哥-来抱抱

translation.en: -[thuds] -[laughs] Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 老天爷！

translation.en: [chuckles softly] Family.
translation.zh: 家人啊

translation.en: -Will, I didn't know you had a brother. -Yeah, I haven't seen Oxy in a long time.
translation.zh: 威尔 我不知道你还有哥哥 是啊 我也很久没见氧氧了

translation.en: Aww, that's a cute nickname.
translation.zh: 这外号好可爱

translation.en: Unless it's short for Oxycontin. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 除非是指氧可酮

translation.en: No, it's short for oxidation.
translation.zh: 不是 是指氧化反应

translation.en: Oxidation destroys beer... and Adam destroys everything.
translation.zh: 氧化反应会毁掉啤酒 亚当会毁掉一切

translation.en: I can get you Oxy.
translation.zh: 我可以买到氧可酮

translation.en: We should be so close.
translation.zh: 我们以前关系特别好

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Adam and I were adopted by farmers in beautiful Yakima Valley.
translation.zh: 亚当和我是被农民收养的 住在美丽的雅基马山谷

translation.en: And as you know, that's where 70% of American hops are grown.
translation.zh: 你们知道 美国70%的啤酒花都是在那里种植的

translation.en: [woman] Nobody knows that, and nobody cares.
translation.zh: 没人知道 也没人关心

translation.en: I'm actually angry that I know now.
translation.zh: 我现在知道了 都有点生气呢

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Pipe down! I'm painting a picture.
translation.zh: 安静！我正在描绘呢

translation.en: Adam snuck me my first beer, and I thought it was horrible.
translation.zh: 亚当给我喝了第一罐啤酒 我觉得难喝极了

translation.en: And that's when he said, "We can make it better."
translation.zh: 然后他说 ：“我们可以让它更好喝”

translation.en: The next few years,
translation.zh: 后来几年里

translation.en: we became the best beer-making duo around.
translation.zh: 我们成了附近最好的酿酒二人组

translation.en: We even entered a beer contest.
translation.zh: 我们还参加了一个啤酒比赛

translation.en: [woman] You guys entered a beer contest when you were that young?
translation.zh: 你们那么年轻就参加啤酒比赛了？

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Wilhelm] And we won.
translation.zh: 而且我们赢了

translation.en: -[woman] That's great. -[Wilhelm] Not great.
translation.zh: 太棒了 一点都不棒

translation.en: Adam really wanted to use his beer,
translation.zh: 亚当想用他的啤酒

translation.en: but I knew mine was better, so...
translation.zh: 但我知道我的更好 所以…

translation.en: at the last minute, I switched them.
translation.zh: 在最后一刻 我给换掉了

translation.en: When he found out...
translation.zh: 他发现时

translation.en: ...he was pissed.
translation.zh: 大发雷霆

translation.en: I will never work with you again.
translation.zh: 我再也不会跟你合作了

translation.en: Traitor! [grunts]
translation.zh: 叛徒！

translation.en: And I never saw him again... till today.
translation.zh: 然后我们再没见过 直到今天

translation.en: Look, the guy makes really, really good beer.
translation.zh: 听着 那家伙做的啤酒非常非常棒

translation.en: -It's just that-- -Will, like, come on.
translation.zh: -只是…-威尔 拜托！

translation.en: You spent your money on a place that's way too big,
translation.zh: 你花钱租的这个地方面积太大了

translation.en: and there's barely any customers.
translation.zh: 几乎没有什么顾客

translation.en: Um, by the way, boss, "taking a growler" means "to shit."
translation.zh: 而且 老板 “一滩”其实有歧义

translation.en: Where were you a week ago?
translation.zh: 一周前 你怎么不早说？

translation.en: Whatever you think about your brother, if he makes amazing beer,
translation.zh: 无论你怎么看待你哥 如果他酿酒很棒为什么不给他一次机会呢？

translation.en: why not give him a shot?
translation.zh: 如果他酿酒很棒为什么不给他一次机会呢？

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: I have discussed it with my team, and we have decided
translation.zh: 我跟我的团队商量过了 我们决定

translation.en: to let you work with us on the following conditions--
translation.zh: 允许你加入 但是有以下条件

translation.en: I accept.
translation.zh: -我接受-首先别哔哔…

translation.en: We gotta make a lot of changes around here.
translation.zh: 这里要做很多改变

translation.en: You gotta change the way you're marketing this place.
translation.zh: 营销的方式也要完全改变

translation.en: Yes, okay, great. That's exactly what we shall do.
translation.zh: 好的 这正是我们应该做的

translation.en: [Adam] Okay, let's get rid of that barrel, these menus.
translation.zh: 好的 把这些桶拿走 还有这些菜单… 什么？

translation.en: -What? -Get rid of those games. No chairs, no tables.
translation.zh: 还有那边的游戏 不要桌椅了

translation.en: Send 'em back to the junkyard I assume you got them from.
translation.zh: 都送回垃圾场 你就是从那淘来的吧

translation.en: Maybe board up these windows.
translation.zh: 可以把这些窗户封掉

translation.en: -Why? -'Cause they look like shit.
translation.zh: -为什么？-太丑了

translation.en: Okay, pool tables and beer pong, here we come.
translation.zh: 好呀！摆上台球桌和投杯球

translation.en: No, the opposite. We want this whole place to be stripped down.
translation.zh: 不不 恰恰相反 我们需要把这里变成极简风

translation.en: We want people to be able to meditate on the beer.
translation.zh: 我们希望人们对着啤酒冥想

translation.en: I want our customers to see the way I prepare the grist for the mash tun.
translation.zh: 我想让顾客们看到我为糖化锅准备麦芽

translation.en: -Oh, my God, he is worse than you. -Told ya.
translation.zh: 天啊 他比你还糟糕 -我早就说了-你们也可以稍微打扮一下

translation.en: And you guys could really stand to fix yourselves up a little bit.
translation.zh: -我早就说了-你们也可以稍微打扮一下

translation.en: Do you work here?
translation.zh: 你在这里工作吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Yes, Chuy, you work here.
translation.zh: 是啊 楚伊 你就是员工

translation.en: -Yes! Yes. -Yes, you do. You do.
translation.zh: -是啊！-没错

translation.en: Okay, great. And you're wearing sandals in a brewery?
translation.zh: 好吧 你在酿酒厂穿着拖鞋吗？

translation.en: -Pool wear? -Yes.
translation.zh: -泳池造型？-是啊

translation.en: -Yes. -[Adam] All right.
translation.zh: -是啊-好吧

translation.en: There's something about you. I like you. Put your hair up, pull it back.
translation.zh: 你很有料哦 我喜欢你 你可以把头发梳到后面让发型更好看一些

translation.en: Make it more presentable.
translation.zh: 你可以把头发梳到后面让发型更好看一些

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure thing.
translation.zh: 好啊 行吧 可以

translation.en: -[Adam] Sick! Look at her ear. It's bad. -What?
translation.zh: -恶心！快看看她的耳朵-怎么了？

translation.en: -Y-Your ear is all messed up. -Oh, my God. Calm down.
translation.zh: -你的耳朵太恶心了-天啊 别激动 就是菜花耳而已

translation.en: It's just cauliflower ear.
translation.zh: 别激动 就是菜花耳而已

translation.en: Yeah, but it is gross. Looks like a dog chewed on it.
translation.zh: 是啊 但确实很恶心 -谢谢-就像被狗咬过

translation.en: It stinks, too.
translation.zh: -而且很臭-楚伊！

translation.en: -It stinks? -[woman] It doesn't.
translation.zh: -还臭吗？-不臭的

translation.en: Sarah used to be an MMA fighter.
translation.zh: 莎拉以前是练综合格斗的

translation.en: Yeah, and I had to retire after I got injured.
translation.zh: 是啊 我受伤以后就退役了

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Sarah] It's an injury.
translation.zh: -天啊-受伤了

translation.en: I bet people are so happy to not see that melted thing.
translation.zh: 我敢打赌 人们不用再看那东西了肯定很开心

translation.en: What? They love it, okay? They love me and my ear.
translation.zh: 人们很喜欢的 喜欢我和我的耳朵

translation.en: [Adam] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Bye. Bye. -[Sarah] Come on, we got shit to do.
translation.zh: -拜拜-走吧 去做事了

translation.en: -[Adam groans] -Hello, hello. Welcome to Rodman's.
translation.zh: 你们好 欢迎光临罗德曼酒吧

translation.en: What can I get you?
translation.zh: 想要点什么？

translation.en: Hi. Um, can I have a Stella?
translation.zh: 嗨 能来一杯时代啤酒吗？

translation.en: We actually only serve our own beer here, so we don't have Stella,
translation.zh: 我们只卖自己酿的啤酒 所以没有时代啤酒

translation.en: but I'd be happy to find you something that is similar-- Sorry, you want a Stella?
translation.zh: -但我很愿意给您找一款差不多的…-抱歉 你想喝时代啤酒？

translation.en: No, Stella is the most unoriginal beer in the world.
translation.zh: 时代啤酒是世界上最没创意的啤酒

translation.en: So that means that you're the most unoriginal person in the world.
translation.zh: 这就说明你是世界上最没创意的人

translation.en: What about you? Hi, how are you?
translation.zh: 你想喝什么？你好呀？

translation.en: -What are you thinking of having? -Do you have something like a Bud Light?
translation.zh: -你想喝什么？-你们有类似百威淡啤的酒吗？

translation.en: No, no, no. Bud Light, Bud Light, Bud Light. [snorts, spits]
translation.zh: -不是吧-百威淡啤…

translation.en: You can lap that up. It'll taste like Bud Light.
translation.zh: 你可以舔掉 跟百威淡啤一样味道

translation.en: That's so gross.
translation.zh: 你太恶心了

translation.en: I apologize on his behalf. The drinks are on me.
translation.zh: 我替他跟你们道歉 我请你们喝酒

translation.en: -We'll go to a different bar. -Weird.
translation.zh: 我们要换一间酒吧了

translation.en: [Wilhelm] If we could buy your first round--
translation.zh: 美女们 第一杯我请你们喝吧…

translation.en: -No! Please come back again! -[door slams]
translation.zh: 别走啊！欢迎再来！

translation.en: What are you doing? You can't turn people away.
translation.zh: 你在干什么？你不能拒绝客人啊

translation.en: Come on, they were barely people.
translation.zh: 拜托 她们算人么

translation.en: They wanted to drink a Stella and a Bud Light.
translation.zh: 她们想喝时代啤酒和百威淡啤

translation.en: Beer is about bringing people together,
translation.zh: 啤酒就是要拉近人们的关系

translation.en: and Rodman's is the perfect hang.
translation.zh: 而罗德曼酒吧就是最好的地方

translation.en: What matters most is making the perfect beer.
translation.zh: 最重要的是酿造出完美的啤酒

translation.en: -Everything else is immaterial. -[Wilhelm] No.
translation.zh: -其他都无关紧要-不是的 氧氧

translation.en: What matters most is serving people,
translation.zh: 最重要的是让顾客满意

translation.en: regardless of their beer preference, race, religion.
translation.zh: 不管他们的啤酒偏好、种族、宗教

translation.en: That's the German way.
translation.zh: 这就是德国人的方式

translation.en: No, I don't think that's right.
translation.zh: 我觉得你说得不对呢

translation.en: [Wilhelm] I've never needed you.
translation.zh: 我根本不需要你

translation.en: When you went off to Oregon State at 14 to get your stupid beer degree...
translation.zh: 当你14岁去俄勒冈州立大学读那个破学位时…

translation.en: My master's of agricultural chemistry and zymurgy?
translation.zh: 我的农业化学和发酵硕士吗？

translation.en: ...I was learning how to make beer the hard way:
translation.zh: 我在艰难地学习如何酿造啤酒

translation.en: on the streets and outdoor plazas of Europe.
translation.zh: 在欧洲的大街上和室外广场上

translation.en: Do have any idea how many beer gardens I drank my way through
translation.zh: 你知道我喝过多少露天啤酒店

translation.en: -before I perfected my craft? -[Adam] And what craft is that?
translation.zh: 才完善了我的手艺吗？ 你到底有什么手艺呢？

translation.en: Throwing up on yourself
translation.zh: 吐在自己身上

translation.en: and then contracting super gonorrhea from a youth hostel toilet seat?
translation.zh: 然后从青年旅社的马桶座圈上感染超级淋病吗？

translation.en: So you do follow me on Instagram!
translation.zh: 所以你关注我的照片墙了！

translation.en: Okay, so you were able to drag your gonorrhea-riddled member
translation.zh: 好吧 你可以把你的淋病患者

translation.en: into a monastery where they make beer, and you memorized their recipes.
translation.zh: 拖进修道院 看他们在那里做啤酒 然后记住他们的配方

translation.en: That does not make you a Braumeister.
translation.zh: 这样不能让你成为酿酒师的

translation.en: That makes you a Xerox machine.
translation.zh: 只能让你成为一台复印机

translation.en: What's a Xerox machine?
translation.zh: 复印机是什么？

translation.en: Can you get her out of here, please? Go.
translation.zh: 你能让她躲远点吗？快走吧

translation.en: Hi, sir.
translation.zh: 嗨 先生

translation.en: Welcome to Rodman's. What can I get you?
translation.zh: 欢迎光临罗德曼酒吧 喝点什么？

translation.en: I'll have whatever you recommend.
translation.zh: 你推荐什么 我就喝什么

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Whatever I recommend. Excellent.
translation.zh: 听我的推荐呀 太好了

translation.en: Adam, this is how you run a brewery. Let me pull my Rodman Stiff Stout for you.
translation.zh: 亚当 开酿酒厂就要这样 我给您来一杯罗德曼硬硬黑啤吧

translation.en: Oh, I gotta change that name.
translation.zh: 我要改一个名字了

translation.en: And he wonders why people think we're a sex store.
translation.zh: 他还好奇为什么别人都以为我们卖性用品呢

translation.en: -[Adam] People don't think about you guys. -Here you go, sir.
translation.zh: 人们不会想到你们的 给您 先生

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[Wilhelm] Take a sip.
translation.zh: 谢谢 尝尝看

translation.en: -[man] Tasty. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好喝-谢谢

translation.en: -[smacks lips] Are you Wilhelm Rodman? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你就是威廉罗德曼吗？

translation.en: You are three months behind on your rent.
translation.zh: 你已经… 拖欠三个月的房租了

translation.en: Pay up or you're gonna be evicted.
translation.zh: 赶紧付钱 不然就要被扫地出门了

translation.en: This is really good.
translation.zh: 这酒真好喝啊

translation.en: It's definitely not,
translation.zh: 怎么可能

translation.en: and I would've gotten him out of here two or three months ago.
translation.zh: 如果是我两三个月前就把他赶出去了

translation.en: Hey, Will, how do you say "you're fucked" in German?
translation.zh: 威尔 “你完蛋了” 用德语怎么说？

translation.en: [in German] You are fucked!
translation.zh: “你完蛋了”

translation.en: [in English] I picked up a few things.
translation.zh: 我学东西很快的

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Okay, we are not going out of business.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们不会破产的

translation.en: We need to spend all of our time in putting together the perfect flight
translation.zh: 我们需要集中精力准备一次完美的推介

translation.en: to impress the hell outta this distributor.
translation.zh: 让经销商能够留下深刻印象

translation.en: What's your favorite beer?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢哪款啤酒？

translation.en: I can run to Angel City and pick up a few kegs.
translation.zh: 我可以去天使之城 去选几桶啤酒

translation.en: [gasps] That's genius.
translation.zh: 太有才了

translation.en: I mean, I-I love where this guy's head is at.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这家伙的各种想法

translation.en: -You're great. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你太厉害了-谢谢

translation.en: -I don't like where this is going. -It feels good here.
translation.zh: -我不喜欢这样-我觉得挺好的

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: -[woman grunts] -[Wilhelm] You came in a little hot again.
translation.zh: 你们入场的方式有点危险啊

translation.en: [woman] Sorry about that.
translation.zh: -抱歉-停车有点困难

translation.en: It's really hard to park when digitally stimulating each other.
translation.zh: -抱歉-停车有点困难 因为我俩正在用手指互相刺激呢

translation.en: You can park safely, or you can orgasm at the same time.
translation.zh: 安全停车和享受高潮 二者不可得兼

translation.en: -I choose the orgasm. -[Adam] Cool.
translation.zh: -我选择享受高潮-好吧

translation.en: Hey, this is my brother Adam.
translation.zh: 这是我哥哥亚当

translation.en: [chuckles] You guys look nothing alike.
translation.zh: 你们长得一点都不像

translation.en: -Thank you. -Danke.
translation.zh: -谢谢-非常感谢

translation.en: -You look like lovers. -[Wilhelm] What?
translation.zh: -你们像是情侣-什么？

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, lovers.
translation.zh: 是啊 情侣

translation.en: -[man] Do you ever...? -No!
translation.zh: -你们有没有…-没有！

translation.en: -That'd be fun. -Cute.
translation.zh: -很有趣的-可爱

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Barely talk.
translation.zh: 我们很少说话

translation.en: Kids Menu! Open for business!
translation.zh: 儿童餐 开张咯！

translation.en: -Chicken fingers! Corn dogs! -Mac and cheese!
translation.zh: -鸡柳条！玉米热狗！-芝士通心粉！

translation.en: Juice boxes! Everything organic...
translation.zh: 盒装果汁！ 都是有机食品…

translation.en: -[both] ...and locally sourced. -[Adam] Wow.
translation.zh: -而且是本地食材-哇哦

translation.en: And adults actually consume this stuff?
translation.zh: 成年人真的吃这些东西吗？

translation.en: Hell yeah, dude. Everyone loves ordering off the kids' menu.
translation.zh: 是啊 哥们 人人都喜欢点儿童餐的

translation.en: -Who doesn't love a kids' menu? -Right?
translation.zh: -谁不喜欢儿童餐呢？-是吧？

translation.en: But restaurants make it off-limits for grown-ups.
translation.zh: 但餐厅禁止成人点儿童餐

translation.en: -[man] For us... -[both] ...nothing is off-limits.
translation.zh: 对我们来说… 百无禁忌

translation.en: -That's what I was gonna say. -I was gonna say that.
translation.zh: -我正要说呢-我正要说呢

translation.en: -You're not-- oh, my-- -[both moaning]
translation.zh: 你不会…我的天啊…

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Nothing's off-limits.
translation.zh: 显然真是百无禁忌呢

translation.en: How do you do it? You live together, you work together.
translation.zh: 你们怎么做到的？你们一起住 一起工作

translation.en: I'm presuming that you don't share deodorant together.
translation.zh: 应该不会共用体香剂吧

translation.en: Correct. Deodorant is a tool of the government
translation.zh: -是的-体香剂是一种政府工具

translation.en: -to track you. -[woman] To control you.
translation.zh: -用来定位你的-控制你

translation.en: They put, uh, salt in it--
translation.zh: 里面会加入盐

translation.en: Aluminum, baby.
translation.zh: 是铝 宝贝

translation.en: Thank you, babe. They put aluminum in it, and that's how they know where you are.
translation.zh: 谢谢 宝贝 他们在里面加入铝 所以就能知道你的位置了

translation.en: God, it is so concerning that you run a food truck
translation.zh: 天啊 太让人担心了 你们做餐车生意

translation.en: and you confused aluminum and salt.
translation.zh: 但是分不清铝和盐

translation.en: Oh, no, they're both fine to eat.
translation.zh: 没事 这俩都可以吃

translation.en: -You can just not put one under your arm. -[woman] Yeah.
translation.zh: -但不能喷在腋下-是啊

translation.en: Do you guys ever get sick of each other?
translation.zh: 你们俩有过厌倦对方的时候吗？

translation.en: We've been together ten months and haven't spent a moment apart.
translation.zh: 我们在一起十个月了 从没分开过

translation.en: -Not one moment. -What about when you go to the bathroom?
translation.zh: -从来没有-哇哦 那你们上厕所的时候呢？

translation.en: [both] What about it?
translation.zh: 上厕所怎么了？

translation.en: -Can I order something? -Yes. We need hairnets.
translation.zh: -我能点东西吃吗？-可以啊 我们需要发网

translation.en: Yes, sanitation is so important.
translation.zh: 是啊 卫生非常重要

translation.en: [Adam] Totally.
translation.zh: 必须的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Cool, cool, cool. I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 很好 我要走了

translation.en: -Uh, you should join me as well. -[woman] Hold on.
translation.zh: -你也跟我走吧-等等

translation.en: You didn't dig in deep back there.
translation.zh: 你没有仔细找

translation.en: Here, want me to give you a lift? Step on my hand.
translation.zh: 需要我抬你一把吗？ -可以吗？-踩我手上吧

translation.en: -[Wilhelm] Adam! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -亚当！-怎么了？

translation.en: I think he's about to put a hairnet over his hat.
translation.zh: 他好像要用发网罩住他的帽子

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, there you go. Okay, right up there.
translation.zh: 好了 可以了 就在上面

translation.en: -[man] Hello. -[Wilhelm] Hi.
translation.zh: -你好-嗨

translation.en: Cole Harris.
translation.zh: 科尔哈里斯

translation.en: -East Valley Craft Distribution. -[Wilhelm] Yes.
translation.zh: -东谷精酿经销公司-是哦

translation.en: -Wilhelm Rodman, brewmaster. -[Adam] Hello.
translation.zh: -威廉罗德曼 酿酒师-你好

translation.en: Adam Rodman. Hi. Head brewmaster.
translation.zh: 亚当罗德曼 我是首席酿酒师

translation.en: -Hi there. Hi. -Okay. Hi.
translation.zh: -好吧 你好-嗨

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Adam] Don't make it weird.
translation.zh: 别搞得怪怪的

translation.en: -Let him go. -All right.
translation.zh: -放开他吧-是啊

translation.en: -So sorry. -[Cole] Okay.
translation.zh: -抱歉-好的

translation.en: -Cool. -[Adam] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: So, uh, which one of you is in charge?
translation.zh: 所以你们谁是负责人？

translation.en: [both] I am.
translation.zh: 我

translation.en: Family business, like the Lehman Brothers.
translation.zh: 家族生意哈 就像雷曼兄弟

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah. Uh, big fans.
translation.zh: 是啊 很喜欢他们

translation.en: You don't know who they are. They stole a lot of money. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你不认识他们 他们骗了好多钱

translation.en: Take a seat, and I will bring a flight that is going to...
translation.zh: 去坐吧 我一会给您上酒 一定让您…

translation.en: bedazzle you.
translation.zh: 眼花缭乱

translation.en: Okay. Great.
translation.zh: 好的 太好了

translation.en: "Bedazzle" him?
translation.zh: “眼花缭乱”？

translation.en: -Oof! That was bad, even for you. -I am nervous!
translation.zh: -太差劲了 甚至对你来说-我太紧张了！

translation.en: So, what restaurants are gonna be serving my beer selection?
translation.zh: 哪些餐厅会供应我们的啤酒呢？

translation.en: Off the top of my head, I think the Tipsy Cow
translation.zh: 我首先想到的是醉牛餐厅和当地农民餐厅

translation.en: and the Local Peasant have a tap open for local brews.
translation.zh: 我首先想到的是醉牛餐厅和当地农民餐厅 这两家都供应本地酒厂的产品

translation.en: Fantastic. And these establishments, what kind of savory apps are they serving?
translation.zh: 很好 这些餐厅主要供应什么餐食呢？

translation.en: Uh, I mean, I-I really enjoy the short-rib poutine.
translation.zh: 要我说 我很喜欢肋排肉酱薯条

translation.en: -Are you writing that down? -[Adam] I'm not.
translation.zh: -你是在记录吗？-没有啦

translation.en: -I see you writing things down. -It looks like that, but I'm not.
translation.zh: 我看你正在记录呢 看起来是这样 但我没有…

translation.en: You just wrote down what I like to eat.
translation.zh: 你把我喜欢吃什么都记下来了

translation.en: I honestly did not. You can trust me.
translation.zh: 我真没有 你可以相信我

translation.en: -Okay. -But I-I'm curious,
translation.zh: -好吧-但我很好奇

translation.en: how often do these establishments clean out their taps?
translation.zh: 这些餐厅多久清洗一次酒桶龙头？

translation.en: Uh, I don't-- When they're supposed to?
translation.zh: 该洗就洗吧？

translation.en: -Okay, that's all I need. -[Cole] Are you writing that down?
translation.zh: -好的 我就需要这些信息了-你在记录吗？

translation.en: -This isn't gonna work out. -Excuse me?
translation.zh: -我觉得不太行-什么？

translation.en: Wait, are you interviewing me?
translation.zh: 等等 你在面试我吗？

translation.en: I'm interviewing you.
translation.zh: -应该是我面试你-不！

translation.en: -[Wilhelm] No! -[Adam] Now that the interview's over,
translation.zh: 我觉得面试已经结束了

translation.en: I am willing to admit to you I've been writing things down.
translation.zh: 我愿意承认 我一直在记录

translation.en: I knew it. You wrote it all down.
translation.zh: 我就知道 你都记下来了

translation.en: Adam! Adam! I'm so sorry about him.
translation.zh: 亚当 我很抱歉

translation.en: Why don't you take a quick sample of our four most popular beers?
translation.zh: 要不您先尝尝我们最受欢迎的四款啤酒吧？

translation.en: -[Cole] Okay. -[Adam] Let me stop you.
translation.zh: -好的-先等一下

translation.en: I believe that we have a right to know
translation.zh: 我觉得我们有权知道

translation.en: if the food these establishments are serving
translation.zh: 这些餐厅的餐食味道是否

translation.en: tastes like, as you would say, große Scheiße,
translation.zh: 就像你说的 “像是一坨屎”

translation.en: which is German for--
translation.zh: 这是一句德语

translation.en: -Yeah, I know what it means. -It's like "big shit."
translation.zh: -是啊 我知道这句话的意思-“像屎一样”

translation.en: -[Cole] Yeah. -I don't know if you knew that.
translation.zh: -是啊-你真知道么？

translation.en: -I knew it. -[Adam] Okay.
translation.zh: -我知道-好吧

translation.en: You know what I think? I think we're done here.
translation.zh: 你知道我在想什么吗？ 我觉得就到这里吧

translation.en: Done? You're gonna order without sampling?
translation.zh: 这就完了？你不品尝就下单吗？太棒了

translation.en: Incredible. How many kegs can we sign you up for?
translation.zh: 你打算买多少桶？

translation.en: I think I'll order... nein. Which is German for "none."
translation.zh: 一桶也不用了 这句话也是德语哦

translation.en: -[Adam] Oh, no, it's not. -See what I did?
translation.zh: -不对-我会说德语吧？

translation.en: No, nein would actually just be "no."
translation.zh: 不对 你的语法错了

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Cole, please, please--
translation.zh: 科尔 求你了…

translation.en: -[Adam] Bye! -What are you doing?
translation.zh: -拜！-你在做什么？

translation.en: I just hope the next guy's more collaborative.
translation.zh: 我只是希望下一个人能更有合作精神

translation.en: That's what I'll say.
translation.zh: 这是我的看法

translation.en: What next guy? There's one guy in Van Nuys!
translation.zh: 什么下一个人？凡奈斯就这一家！

translation.en: One guy!
translation.zh: 只有一个人！

translation.en: There's one distributor, and it's that guy? [grunts]
translation.zh: 就一家经销商 就是他吗？

translation.en: Van Nuys, it's a bad place-- [groans]
translation.zh: 凡奈斯真是烂地方…

translation.en: -Is this what happened to your ear? -Shut up, you baby!
translation.zh: -你的耳朵就是这样烂的吗？-闭嘴 小婴儿！

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: -I never should've tracked you down. -I never should've accepted your offer.
translation.zh: -我就不该费事找你来-我就不该接受你的邀请

translation.en: This place is even more of a disaster than your melted ear.
translation.zh: 这地方比你的耳朵还要烂

translation.en: -I feel bad for Chuy. -Wanna go for round two?
translation.zh: 我很同情楚伊 -你想要第二轮吗？-不了！

translation.en: -[Adam] I don't! -See where he parked?
translation.zh: -你想要第二轮吗？-不了！ -他把车停哪了？-我去找他吧

translation.en: -I'll find him. -[Wilhelm] Thanks.
translation.zh: -他把车停哪了？-我去找他吧

translation.en: You are doing the same thing you always do.
translation.zh: 谢谢 氧氧 你还是老样子

translation.en: -You ruin everything. -Oh, hard disagree.
translation.zh: -把一切都毁了-我不同意

translation.en: No, don't sit. You're out. Get out.
translation.zh: 不要坐了 你出局了 快走吧

translation.en: -I'm out? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 我出局了吗？

translation.en: -[Adam] Okay. -This is done.
translation.zh: -好吧-我受够了

translation.en: -[Adam] Okay, great. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好的 太好了-是啊

translation.en: -Bye. -See ya. This was a wonderful reunion.
translation.zh: -很好 拜拜-再见 很高兴能重聚

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 拜拜

translation.en: -Fuck. -What?
translation.zh: -可恶-怎么了？

translation.en: I have nowhere else to go.
translation.zh: 我没地方去了

translation.en: What do you mean? You said you were killing it in Portland.
translation.zh: 什么意思？ 你说你在波特兰特别成功

translation.en: [Adam] I was.
translation.zh: 曾经是的

translation.en: I had a falling out with the local brewers.
translation.zh: 我和当地酿酒厂吵翻了

translation.en: -There's, like, 100 breweries out there. -There's 84.
translation.zh: -那边有上百家啤酒厂-一共84家

translation.en: And a lot of them are very bad.
translation.zh: 其中很多都很烂

translation.en: Some of them, their best brews taste like the cadaver of a local garbageman.
translation.zh: 有些酒厂最好的啤酒尝起来就像当地垃圾处理工的尸体

translation.en: I say that as a fan.
translation.zh: 这还是好听的形容呢

translation.en: Did you tell them that?
translation.zh: 你直接告诉他们了吗？

translation.en: Yes, I told them that, okay? It was at a beer expo.
translation.zh: 是啊 我说了 行吗？当时是啤酒展销会

translation.en: Someone gave me a microphone, I started riffing,
translation.zh: 有人把话筒给我 我就即兴说了一段

translation.en: and people couldn't handle it.
translation.zh: 结果人们都接受不了了

translation.en: I also had a problem with the fact
translation.zh: 而且我还接受不了

translation.en: that they were letting IPAs into the competitions.
translation.zh: 他们竟然同意让印度淡色艾尔参加比赛

translation.en: IPAs are what people drink when they're all out of good ideas
translation.zh: 人们没有好点子了才会去喝印度淡色艾尔

translation.en: or never had a good idea to begin with.
translation.zh: 或者压根就没有过好点子

translation.en: -[booing] -Oh-- Okay, okay, yeah!
translation.zh: 好吧！够了！

translation.en: So I submitted an IPA that had a hallucinogen in it.
translation.zh: 所以我提交了一种含有致幻剂的印度淡色艾尔

translation.en: You tried to drug everyone?
translation.zh: 你要给大家下药吗？

translation.en: That's the difference between you and me.
translation.zh: 这就是咱俩的区别

translation.en: You try, I succeed.
translation.zh: 你还在努力 我已经成功了

translation.en: -here. -You want to talk about that right now?

translation.en: but once a month.

translation.en: And basically, you pleasure yourself right to the point of climax,

translation.en: And what you produce is like a bottle-conditioned saison:

translation.en: frothy, rich, distinct.

translation.en: Right now, I'm kinda sensitive 'cause I'm on day nine.

translation.en: I am frickin' amazing.

translation.en: What to brew? What to brew?

translation.en: What about a lager?

translation.en: No. Smoked ale, it's too risky.

translation.en: -You? -Yeah.

translation.en: I know I can.

translation.en: -May the best beer win. -[scoffs] Okay.
